comment:
* Configuration for creation of a virtual sensor.
 *
 * @see VirtualSensor
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: DIRECT_REPORT_MASK
variables.comment: Mask for direct mode highest rate level, bit 7, 8, 9.

variables.name: DIRECT_CHANNEL_SHIFT
variables.comment: Mask for supported direct channel, bit 10, 11

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel parcel, int flags)
public int getType()
methods.comment: * Returns the type of the sensor. * * @see Sensor#getType() * @see Sensor types

methods.name: public String getName()
methods.comment: * Returns the name of the sensor, which must be unique per sensor type for each virtual device.

methods.name: public String getVendor()
methods.comment:
* Returns the vendor string of the sensor.
     *
     * @see Builder#setVendor

methods.name: public float getMaximumRange()
methods.comment:
* Returns the maximum range of the sensor in the sensor's unit.
     *
     * @see Sensor#getMaximumRange

methods.name: public float getResolution()
methods.comment:
* Returns the resolution of the sensor in the sensor's unit.
     *
     * @see Sensor#getResolution

methods.name: public float getPower()
methods.comment:
* Returns the power in mA used by this sensor while in use.
     *
     * @see Sensor#getPower

methods.name: public int getMinDelay()
methods.comment:
* Returns the minimum delay allowed between two events in microseconds, or zero depending on
     * the sensor type.
     *
     * @see Sensor#getMinDelay

methods.name: public int getMaxDelay()
methods.comment:
* Returns the maximum delay between two sensor events in microseconds.
     *
     * @see Sensor#getMaxDelay

methods.name: public int getHighestDirectReportRateLevel()
methods.comment:
* Returns the highest supported direct report mode rate level of the sensor.
     *
     * @see Sensor#getHighestDirectReportRateLevel()

methods.name: public int getDirectChannelTypesSupported()
methods.comment:
* Returns a combination of all supported direct channel types.
     *
     * @see Builder#setDirectChannelTypesSupported(int)
     * @see Sensor#isDirectChannelTypeSupported(int)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel parcel, int flags)
